course_description: The objective of this course is to introduce and develop a fundamental knowledge of jazz harmony, vocabulary and structure through the analysis of nomenclature, chords, scales and form. Students will also learn basic arranging skills for the small jazz ensemble using common practice techniques.
prerequisites: This course requires MUS 221 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2046, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: G. Motley, Status: Open
